name: Reap What's Been Sown
description:
In Reap What's Been Sown, you play as Grim the reaper. You must harvest the soul of a man who recently passed away. Things aren't so straight forward though; you must first solve the mystery behind his death. Enter the minds his friends and solve puzzles to unlock their memories. Can you uncover the truth? Or will his soul escape your grasp?

Credits:

Bryan Huke: Developer, Writer, Designer

Anjali Nijjar: Artist, Designer

Sam Curtice: Music Composer

Ange Lee: Character Artist

Silas Wunder: Sound Effects
